title: Article 1 - Attendance for Nonmanagerial/confidential Employees in New York State Departments and Institutions
content:
Article 1 - Attendance for Nonmanagerial/confidential Employees in New York State Departments and Institutions

State Regulations

Part 20 - General Attendance Provisions (§ 20.1 to 20.4)

Part 21 - ABSENCE WITH PAY (§ 21.1 to 21.16)

Part 22 - Leaves Without Pay (§ 22.1 to 22.3)

Part 23 - Drawing Of Earned Credits Upon Separation Or Entry Into Armed Forces (§ 23.1 to 23.3)

Part 24 - Crediting Other Public Employment As State Service (§ 24.1)

Part 25 - Suspension Of Rules (§ 25.1 to 25.2)

Part 26 - Applicability (§ 26.1 to 26.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
